item.title: Changing skill lvl
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

Ok first open up client.java
And search for “int getlevel”
and you should see something like

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0;
when you see "for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {" change the lvl 99 to a other lvl Each server has a max skill lvl and combat xp Find your servers max xp and replace the xp to yours if (exp > Change this to your servers max xp) hope this hepled u

Read full topic
